text:
Police Seeking Driver Who Killed Pedestrian, Struck Two Others  at 1001 N Delaware Ave, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, 19125

12/27/2022, 3:40:28 PM

Police have received a 911 report of a light blue Ford Mustang crashing into vehicles and attempting to run over people.

12/26/2022, 8:08:19 PM

Police on the scene confirm that a baby blue Ford Mustang has struck and injured a person.

12/26/2022, 8:22:19 PM

Police are seeking a woman involved in a deadly hit-and-run spree in North Philadelphia Monday night. The first incident occurred at about 8 p.m. in the parking lot of Rivers Casino on Delaware Avenue. A driver in a "silver/blue" 2005 Ford Mustang struck a 51-year-old man on a scooter, shattering his leg. The driver struck three other cars in the valet area before fleeing the scene. The driver then knocked a 53-year-old man off of a bicycle at Broad and Spring Garden streets. He was taken to an area hospital in stable condition. The suspect then struck and killed a 22-year-old man who was standing at a bus stop at Broad Street and Lehigh Avenue. Police found the unoccupied Mustang a few blocks away with heavy damage. The driver has not been arrested. Anyone with information that may help identify the suspect or aid the investigation is urged to contact the police department.

12/27/2022, 11:35:20 AM

This incident occurred in city council district 1. 

Representative: Mark Squilla @marksquilla
